channel.title: Guess who needs help again...yeah me i adding monsters in your own server
channel.description: ok i ned help adding new monsters into my server i tryed adding a KBD but when i tryed to click on it.. it broke down... and my server crashed i edited in and also i need help editing my welcome message yes i admit im a idiot :o :confused:

item.title: Guess who needs help again...yeah me i adding monsters in your own server
item.dc:creator: @AARisAIR AARisAIR
item.description:
@AARisAIR wrote:

You have to add it in autospawn

spawn = 50	2717	9816	0	2969	3384	2958	3376	1	King Black

and in npcdrops

npcdrop = 50		0		536	1	1149	1	1747	1	995	5000

If you dont it will crash each time you try to attack it. I think thats all you have to add but I put it in a long time ago.

Read full topic
